programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. The pair pretend to be deliriously in love during the once-in-a-lifetime trip and keep up appearances in front of other guests. programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.title: Ferrari

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. While scratching around Kuwait in search of a story about the Iraq war, reporter Bob Wilton meets Lyn Cassady, who claims to be a member of an experimental military unit that uses psychic powers to read the enemy's thoughts, can pass through solid walls and even kill a goat by staring at it. Cassady confides that he's on a secret mission, and heads into Iraq accompanied by the sceptical Wilton Grant Heslov - Director, Grant Heslov - Director George Clooney - Lyn Cassady Ewan McGregor - Bob Wilton Jeff Bridges - Bill Django Kevin Spacey - Larry Hooper Stephen Lang - Brigadier General Dean Hopgood Nick Offerman - Scotty Mercer Robert Patrick - Todd Nixon Rebecca Mader - Debora Wilton Stephen Root - Gus Lacey George Clooney - Lyn Cassady Ewan McGregor - Bob Wilton Jeff Bridges - Bill Django Kevin Spacey - Larry Hooper Stephen Lang - Brigadier General Dean Hopgood Nick Offerman - Scotty Mercer Robert Patrick - Todd Nixon Rebecca Mader - Debora Wilton Stephen Root - Gus Lacey.

In the middle of all this, the Brady bunch - mum, dad and six children - live a happy and idyllic existence, caught in a time warp of 1970s values. programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Wifelike
programme.sub-title: Romance, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Crime/detective, Mystery, Action ║ 2022 ║ 15
programme.desc: In the near future, detective William Bradwell hunts down criminals who trade robot companions on the black market. He has been assigned a mechanised doppelganger created by the Wifelike corporation, which has been hard-coded with many of his late spouse Meredith's memories and quirks. However, a shadowy organisation hacks the android's AI programming for nefarious purposes. programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughter's beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didn't know was there. programme.desc: Period horror based on the classic Oscar Wilde tale, starring Colin Firth and Ben Barnes. programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Ben enjoy an incredible first date, but attraction quickly burns out and they are delighted to be apart. However, fate compels the duo to reconsider, and they seize the opportunity to attend a lavish wedding in Australia, as a couple. The pair pretend to be deliriously in love during the once-in-a-lifetime trip and keep up appearances in front of other guests. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: In an NFC championship game rematch, the Eagles host the 49ers during week 13 of the season. Jalen Hurts lifted the Eagles to a league-best 10-1 record with victory over the Bills. (03.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The San Francisco 49ers and the Detroit Lions advance to the NFC Championship game with a Super Bowl LVIII bid on the line. Can the Lions keep their storybook season going here? (28.01).

programme.title: PDC Classics 2023
programme.desc: In a classic at the World Matchplay in July 2011, Simon Whitlock let a seemingly unassailable lead slip when Andy Hamilton recovered from a 15-8 deficit. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: PDC Classics 2023
programme.desc: Relive the longest final in PDC history as Gary Anderson took on Mensur Suljovic in one of the greatest ever finals at the 2018 World Matchplay. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: LIVE: World Matchplay Darts Q/Final
programme.desc: The quarter-finals on day six of the 2024 World Matchplay, taking place at Winter Gardens in Blackpool. (18.07).
